00020 #pragma once
00021 
00022 #include "bits/list_basics.h"
00023 
00024 namespace cxx {
00025 
00026 class S_list_item
00027 {
00028 public:
00029   S_list_item() : _n(0) {}
00030   explicit S_list_item(bool) {}
00031 
00032 private:
00033   template<typename T, typename P> friend class S_list;
00034   template<typename T, typename P> friend class S_list_tail;
00035   template<typename T, typename X> friend class Bits::Basic_list_policy;
00036 
00037   S_list_item(S_list_item const &);
00038   void operator = (S_list_item const &);
00039 
00040   S_list_item *_n;
00041 };
00042 
00043 template< typename T, typename POLICY = Bits::Basic_list_policy< T, S_list_item > >
00044 class S_list : public Bits::Basic_list<POLICY>
00045 {
00046 private:
00047   S_list(S_list const &);
00048   void operator = (S_list const &);
00049 
00050   typedef typename Bits::Basic_list<POLICY> Base;
00051 
00052 public:
00053   typedef typename Base::Iterator Iterator;
00054 
00055   // BSS allocation
00056   explicit S_list(bool x) : Base(x) {}
00057 
00058   S_list() : Base() {}
00059 
00060   void add(T *e)
00061   {
00062     e->_n = this->_f;
00063     this->_f = e;
00064   }
00065 
00066   template< typename CAS >
00067   void add(T *e, CAS const &c)
00068   {
00069     do
00070       {
00071         e->_n = this->_f;
00072       }
00073     while (!c(&this->_f, e->_n, e));
00074   }
00075 
00076   void push_front(T *e) { add(e); }
00077   T *pop_front()
00078   {
00079     T *r = this->front();
00080     if (this->_f)
00081       this->_f = this->_f->_n;
00082     return r;
00083   }
00084 
00085   void insert(T *e, Iterator const &pred)
00086   {
00087     S_list_item *p = *pred;
00088     e->_n = p->_n;
00089     p->_n = e;
00090   }
00091 
00092   static void insert_before(T *e, Iterator const &succ)
00093   {
00094     S_list_item **x = Base::__get_internal(succ);
00095 
00096     e->_n = *x;
00097     *x = e;
00098   }
00099 
00100   static void replace(Iterator const &p, T*e)
00101   {
00102     S_list_item **x = Base::__get_internal(p);
00103     e->_n = (*x)->_n;
00104     *x = e;
00105   }
00106 
00107   static Iterator erase(Iterator const &e)
00108   {
00109     S_list_item **x = Base::__get_internal(e);
00110     *x = (*x)->_n;
00111     return e;
00112   }
00113 
00114 };
00115 
00116 
00117 template< typename T >
00118 class S_list_bss : public S_list<T>
00119 {
00120 public:
00121   S_list_bss() : S_list<T>(true) {}
00122 };
00123 
00124 template< typename T, typename POLICY = Bits::Basic_list_policy< T, S_list_item >  >
00125 class S_list_tail : public S_list<T, POLICY>
00126 {
00127 private:
00128   typedef S_list<T, POLICY> Base;
00129 
00130 public:
00131   S_list_tail() : Base(), _tail(&this->_f) {}
00132 
00133   void push_back(T *e)
00134   {
00135     e->_n = 0;
00136     *_tail = e;
00137     _tail = &e->_n;
00138   }
00139 
00140   void clear()
00141   {
00142     Base::clear();
00143     _tail = &this->_f;
00144   }
00145 
00146   void append(S_list_tail &o)
00147   {
00148     T *x = o.front();
00149     *_tail = x;
00150     if (x)
00151       _tail = o._tail;
00152     o.clear();
00153   }
00154 
00155   void move_to(S_list_tail &t)
00156   { t._f = this->_f; t._tail = _tail; clear(); }
00157 
00158 private:
00159   S_list_item **_tail;
00160 };
00161 
00162 }
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
